themes.scientific_basis: Based on attachment theory and research on building trust in relationships.
themes.description: This theme explores how honesty strengthens trust, providing practical exercises to help couples build a strong foundation for open communication.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from vulnerability research, highlighting its role in creating authentic connections.
themes.description: This theme helps couples practice sharing their fears and insecurities, fostering emotional safety and genuine openness.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by defensive behavior theories in psychology.
themes.description: This theme examines the barriers to honesty, helping couples identify and overcome defensive behaviors that hinder open communication.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research on degrees of honesty and their impact on relationships.
themes.description: This theme helps couples assess where they fall on the honesty spectrum, encouraging them to balance honesty with tact to nurture mutual understanding.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by self-disclosure theory, emphasizing the benefits of sharing personal information.
themes.description: This theme guides couples through exercises in sharing meaningful stories or secrets, reinforcing their bond through mutual openness.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in Carl Rogers' concept of unconditional positive regard.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to create non-judgmental environments where both partners feel safe to express their truths openly and honestly.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from conflict resolution research focusing on authenticity and constructive communication.
themes.description: This theme teaches couples how to remain honest during disagreements, ensuring that difficult truths are shared with compassion and respect.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research on routine communication and its role in sustaining honesty.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to schedule regular check-ins where they can openly discuss emotions, thoughts, and any lingering concerns.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by feedback theory and its role in improving communication dynamics.
themes.description: This theme focuses on giving and receiving honest feedback constructively, enabling both partners to address issues openly without fear of conflict.
